title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practice Competencies: User Experience Analysis and Improvement for MOOC Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistics, machine learning concepts, and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Mobile analytics tools can be used to collect and refine user review data from SWAYAM and Coursera apps.
Python-based deep learning models can be employed to perform sentiment analysis on user feedback and generate visualized reports.
Based on analytical results, UI/UX improvement strategies for MOOC platforms can be mathematically modeled and presented as project deliverables.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
